name: Links Puzzle
description:
Unique among all puzzle games! Links Puzzle is a Relaxing and Brain Challenging Puzzle Game.
 

This game is a trip to a unique world, with a lot of logic and fun. If you think you are an intelligent person, you are in the right place. This brainteaser game will challenge your logical skills while you solve the target patterns.
 

Simple, Smart, Addictive, Challenging, Relaxing and Fun game. All in one! 

Links Puzzle will help you improve your ability to focus and to relax, while you develop your own strategy to solve puzzles.

The goal is simple: Move every tile (whose moves are determined by its links with another tiles) until create the pattern suggested. Play this links puzzle once and just you won't be able to put it down.

Features:

  •  Minimalist design
  •  Smart level design
  •  Relaxing atmosphere
  •  4 Game Modes: Classic, Switch color, Magic and Relaxing
